Uses of AudioDevice in com.apple.audio.hardware
 

Methods in com.apple.audio.hardware that return AudioDevice
static AudioDevice AudioHardware.getSystemOutputDevice()
          Returns the System ouput AudioDevice.
static AudioDevice AudioHardware.getDefaultOutputDevice()
          Returns the default ouput AudioDevice.
static AudioDevice AudioHardware.getDefaultInputDevice()
          Returns the default input AudioDevice.
static AudioDevice[] AudioHardware.getAudioDevices()
          Will return an array of AudioDevice objects that represent all of the audio devices that are currently found within the system.
 AudioDevice AudioStream.getOwningDevice()
          Returns the Device that own's this stream
 

Methods in com.apple.audio.hardware with parameters of type AudioDevice
static void AudioHardware.setDefaultDevice(int inPropertyID, AudioDevice inDevice)
          Sets the supplied device as the default for that task (System, Input or Output).
 int AudioDeviceIOProc.execute(AudioDevice device, AudioTimeStamp inNow, AudioBufferList inInputData, AudioTimeStamp inInputTime, AudioBufferList outOutputData, AudioTimeStamp inOutputTime)
          The execute method is called by the AudioHardware lib for each specified IO cycle of the supplied AudioDevice.
 int ADevicePropertyListener.execute(AudioDevice device, int inChannel, boolean isInput, int inPropertyID)
          When registered the property listener's execute method is called when the supplied property is changed.
